mapper.select: select t.now_route_node as nowRouteNode, (select m.node_name from node_info m where t.now_route_node = m.node_code limit 1) as nowRouteName, t.next_route_node as nextRouteNode, (select n.node_name from node_info n where t.next_route_node = n.node_code limit 1) as nextRouteName, t.yn from sys_call_rela t
